GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object with a the article and all of its details,

article.title: Student SUES Mitch!
article.author: rogersop
article.body: We all love Mitch and his wonderful, unique typing style. However, the volume of his typing has ALLEGEDLY burst another students eardrums, and they are now suing for damages

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of objects with comments all from one article_id, serves a comment back based on what it is sent through a post request

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves a comment back based on what it is sent through a post request

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id/.description: serves an updated vote count  back based on vote count sent and article id supplied
